channel.title: jimgrisham tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from jimgrisham.

item.description: Agenda item 5 resolution (A/ES-11/L.1) passes @UN #GeneralAssembly during the Emergency Special Session #11 (convened to address the #Russian attacks inside #Ukraine). Vote results: 141-5 (with 35 abstentions) Full text (English): https://t.co/v40n4cl5a0 #UNCharter #ESS11

@markproxy Reminds me of something recently read in a Corey book: “There is nothing in that message. Nothing. He is walking around his words like they’ve got poisoned spikes on them. And what’s he got? Threats. No one makes threats.”
